Description of incident: A hacker was able to access the names, mailing addresses, email addresses, dates of birth, usernames, passwords, phone numbers, and credit card details of customers.  The breach occurred and was detected on Sunday, March 25.  Manhattan Prep removed all credit card information previously associated with compromised customer accounts from their database.  Customer account passwords were automatically reset.  Customers were also encouraged to change any passwords that were used for both Manhattan Prep and other accounts.
